title: WHAT ISLAMISTS BELIEVE A conversation with Shadi Hamid
itunes:author: Toby Buckle
itunes:summary: Shadi Hamid discusses the different types of Islamism and their beliefs about government, democracy, and Islamic law.  We also cover perceptions of Islam and its relationship with liberalism.
